item.title: Random Chance to add item?
item.dc:creator: @adam2348 adam2348
item.description:
@adam2348 wrote:

ok try something like this:

if(castOnItem == 1633) {
    deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
    int randItem = misc.random(99) //99 not 100 - cuz 0 counts
    if (randItem >= 0 && randItem <= 29) {
        addItem(XXXX, 1);  //30/100 chance to get this item
    else if (randItem >= 30 && randItem <= 74) {
        addItem(XXXX, 1);  //45/100 chance to get this item 
    else if (randItem >= 75 && randItem <= 99) {
        addItem(XXXX, 1);  //25/100 chance to get this item 
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Random Chance to add item?
item.dc:creator: @urion2 urion2
item.description:
@urion2 wrote:

I got something like this…

if(castOnItem == 1633) { deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1); addItem(XXXX, 1); }

I want to do it so that instead of always giving the item(s), it will have a random chance of getting it. For example, you have 30% chance to get item X, 45% chance to get item Y and 25% chance to get item Z.

I guess this must be pretty simple, can some1 help me with this please?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 09:41:42 AM[/size][hr]Can some1 plz answer? I need it really bad[br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 10:27:01 AM[/size][hr]any1… [br][size=1]Posted at: November 21, 2006, 11:05:03 AM[/size][hr]…
